channel.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
channel.description:
Noticed nobody had made a thread about this, and I'm sure some people would be intrested in using it.
Get your keys from here (Takes 2min): http://www.fileplay.net/keys
Currently the mirrors are full, but you could download from [url=http://url=http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5315680/Battlefield_Bad_Company_2_-_Closed_beta_28_jan._-_25._feb.]TPB[/url], but it has a shit ratio, but I'm assuming if you have access to a private tracker it would be much easier.
EDIT: If the mirrors are still full at the time you are viewing this, you could download from [url=http://www.filefront.com/15447187/Battlefield-Bad-Company-2-Closed-Beta-Client/]HERE[/url]
EDIT2: The website states 'NO MORE KEYS', sorry.

hardcore on 360 is just snipercampfest 2010

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

I have been playing this in all of my free time, I love it. Completely blows Modern Warfare 2 out of the water in my opinion, and greatly improves upon Bad Company. It’s nice to have a hardcore mode included as well

Read full topic

Its released today

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Thug-life:

No one plays these types of games to be realistic.

'Sif.

I’ve been playing pretty much non-stop for the past few weeks. Even if it is just one map, with a fuckload of bugs, and shitty fucking reg issues, and fucking faggots that steal choppers when they cant fucking fly…
Anyway, FPS games are meant to be like that, hook you in so you enjoy playing, then fucking beat you to the ground until you get good enough to fuck others up.

When the actual game releases, most of the balancing and bugs will be sorted, and not to mention more maps and game modes, and vehicles, and guns, and etc.
This game will be awesome.

My hours from the past two weeks or so, however long BC2 has actually been detected by xfire.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]

item.description:

I heard the PC version would get 20vs20 battles, while the Console versions would stick with 12vs12. Any confirmations on this?

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:30, topic:327514”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=423903.msg3120414#msg3120414 date=1265485441]

Is it more realistic to take three 50 cal bullets to the throat and walk away like you’re rambo?

We are talking about Battlefield 1942 right? There are no 50 caliber guns, the American ones would be .30-06 (.30 cal), British would be .303 British (.303 cal), and German would be 8mm Mauser (~.31 cal). So perhaps it is more realistic than you think.
[/quote]

The title kinda explains what game it is :P:P[/quote]

Cowie`:

The only thing I’ve ever disliked about BF games is that snipers aren’t powerful enough.

I think snipers are overpowered in other games. Unless you get a headshot, you really can’t be guaranteed to kill on the first shot in real life, or BF1942.
[/quote]

Ok I’ll just shoot someone in the fucking throat and they’ll take it like they’re rambo.

The second unlocked sniper, the semi-auto is also massively underpowered. When you know someone who has taken THREE sniper bullets to be killed from whatever range in any part of their body beside their head please come back and tell me.[/quote]

He said all BF games, then we started talking about 1942, so no, the title doesn’t say what specific game we were talking about.

Read full topic

We are talking about Battlefield 1942 right? There are no 50 caliber guns, the American ones would be .30-06 (.30 cal), British would be .303 British (.303 cal), and German would be 8mm Mauser (~.31 cal). So perhaps it is more realistic than you think.[/quote]

The title kinda explains what game it is :P:P

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
item.dc:creator: @Cheese_Police c|p
item.description:
@Cheese_Police wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Is it more realistic in a game like Counter Strike to shoot someone in the foot or leg with a sniper rifle and have them die instantly?

The AWP is a total bullshit gun, you are right. With that gun there’s an extremely high chance that you will kill someone no matter where you hit them.
The scout however, is an elegant weapon… for a more civilized age.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:21, topic:327514”]You can get shot in the neck and it not really injure you, depending on the location of the bullet that is.

Is it more realistic in a game like Counter Strike to shoot someone in the foot or leg with a sniper rifle and have them die instantly?[/quote]

That may have been the case in cs1.6, but in CS:S using the magnum sniper the bullets do different damage depending on where you were hit. For example shoot them in the arm/shoulder/leg its a good 90 damage, upper torso and you’re dead instantly.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:21, topic:327514”]You can get shot in the neck and it not really injure you, depending on the location of the bullet that is.

Is it more realistic in a game like Counter Strike to shoot someone in the foot or leg with a sniper rifle and have them die instantly?[/quote]
Is it more realistic to take three 50 cal bullets to the throat and walk away like you’re rambo?

I’d prefer snipers to be powerful, what is the point in them being weak when they are bolt action and basically every other gun is auto, be it semi or fully.

Read full topic

item.title: Battlefield Bad Company 2 Beta [PC]
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

Moparisthebest:

I think snipers are overpowered in other games. Unless you get a headshot, you really can’t be guaranteed to kill on the first shot in real life, or BF1942.

Ok I’ll just shoot someone in the fucking throat and they’ll take it like they’re rambo.

The second unlocked sniper, the semi-auto is also massively underpowered. When you know someone who has taken THREE sniper bullets to be killed from whatever range in any part of their body beside their head please come back and tell me.

Read full topic
